title: 하루정도야”
content:
깨끗해서ㅜ좋았음
같이 묵었던 외국애가 클럽? 술파티 하다가 새벽에 남자놈 데리고 들어와서 놀랐던거 말고는 뭐 괜찮았음 여성전용방이었는데^^

title: 위치빼고 나쁘지않아요”
content:
위치가 도심에서 15분정도 걸어야할위치에 있고
버스나 트램 정류장도 타고가기 애매한위치해있어서 싼가격의 가격 아니였으면 다시 이용할지는 모르겠네요..
그대신에 직원분들 다친절하시고 시설도 나쁘지않았어요!

title: 그닥 추천하지 않아요..”
content: 숙박비 아끼려고 하다보니 왔는데 위치가 번화가랑 떨어져있고, 근처에 마트도 없어서 뭐 하나 사려면 한참 걸어야해요. 처음에 룸이 너무 깔끔해서 좋다고 생각했는데 침대에서 조금만 움직여도 삐그덕 거려서 불편했고, 가장 별로였던건 화장실 !! 캠핑카에 있는 간이 화장실 수준이라 여러모로 불편했습니다. 좋았던건 공용공간이 굉장히 넓고 깔끔하다는 것. 그리고 주방시설이 잘 갖춰져 있어서 요리해먹기 좋다는 거 인 것 같습니다. 맨체스터에 정말 짧게 머물러서 돈을 아끼고 싶다면 참고 이용할만 한데 장기간 숙박은 비추합니다!!

title: 잘 지냈어요.”
content: 4인실이었는데 방 안에 화장실 샤워실 같이 구비되서 정말 편했어요. 2층 썼는데, 2층에도 콘센트 있고 좋네요. 오리때문에 잠못자요.

title: 가성비 좋은 호스텔”
content: 시설도 괜찮고 나쁘지 않습니다! 위치가 조금 애매하지만 담에도 이용할 듯 싶습니다

title: 무난”
content: 시내랑은 거리가 멀음 하지만 트램타면 금방, 숙소 앞 강에 오리 소리가 아침마다 시끄러움, 같은방 외국인 2명 첨에 놀리는 느낌주다 친해져서 괜찮았음

title: 좋아요”
content: 굳굳

title: 매우 만족”
content: 위치는 시내에서 조금 떨어져 있으나 트램이 있어서 괜찮다. 4인실 썼는데 숙소도 매우 깔끔함. 화장실이 조금 좁긴 하지만 층마다 있는 공용 화장실 / 샤워실이 넓고 깨끗해서 큰 문제는 없었다. 앞에 자그마한 강이 있어서 운치가 있고 거위들 돌아다니는 걸 구경하는 소소한 재미가 있다.

title: 가성비 굿”
content: 전반적으로 깨끗하고, 친절합니다. 가장 좋은 점은 숙박객을 위한 무료 주차장이 있가는 것입니다. 맨체스터 시내에 무료주차장 있다는 사실 하나만으로 최고 입니다. 화장실 청결이 조금 아쉬웠지만 쓰지 못할 정도는 아니었습니다.

title: 가성비 좋습니다.”
content: 가성비 굿. 2층침대는 어디에 배정받느냐가 정말 중요한 듯. 2층에 있을때는 세상 불편했는데 1층으로 갈아탄뒤 마냥 행복. 숙소 깨끗하고 분위기 좋음.

title: 위치가 조금..”
content: 맨체스터 피카딜리역에서 걸어서 30분 거리입니다. 트램타고도 18분? 거리가 멀다보니 시내 중심가에서도 떨어져있는데 이점빼고는 전부 좋았습니다.

title: 위치도 좋고 깔끔”
content: 위치도 역에서 얼마 안되고 깔끔했습니다

title: 굿”
content: 엔굿

title: 정말좋네요 주변도조용하고”
content: ㅎㅎ

title: 부엌이 진짜 좋아요”
content:
캠핑카여행 중 하루묶었는데
주차도되고 편했어요
조식도주고 주방이 좋고
모든부재료가 있어서 요리하기 짱
방은 좀 촌스러웠지만 만족합니다 ㅎ

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: 이번 여행에서 묵은 호텔 중 가장 가성비가 좋았습니다! 👍🏻”
content: 방 크기, 청결도, 편의성이 모두 좋습니다! 차가 있다면 케임브리지에서 머무르기에 좋은 곳입니다!

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: 최고”
content: Peaceful place to stay, friendly staff, lovely location.

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: Great quality”
content:
Furnishings bedding and towels good quality. Spacious room. Lots of attention to detail. Nice touch providing biscuits . 
Quiet surroundings 
Definitely recommend

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: Bali room”
content:
We chose  the Bali room to remind us of holidays  abroad.
Smaller rooms but quite adequate  for our one night stay. Comfy bed and quality linens.
Well equipped  unit and a beautiful garden to have a wander around  after the travel or just sit outside to take in the view

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: 최고”
content: Very comfortable unit, lux bathroom. Lovely gardens. A little way out of town, but quiet location. Would stay again.

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: 우수”
content: Lovely quiet spot and beautifully decorated and clean room!

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: 최고”
content: Totally cute and stylish. Lovely place to chill and unwind if you have your own transport. Very quaint!! I’m a travel agent so will definitely be recommending it to clients!

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: Shared house”
content:
Please note: lovely lady answered on arrival however we didn't realize it was an actual house with shared facilities.
Lovely lady, very clean and tidy however if you prefer your own tv, kitchen and time to yourself this may not be an option. Good for a single person, work travel but as a couple traveling, we cancelled on arrival as we thought it was a self contained home for traveling not shared.

title: Shared house”
content:

Lovely lady, very clean and tidy however if you prefer your own tv, kitchen and time to yourself this may not be an option. Good for a single person, work travel but as a couple traveling, we cancelled on arrival as we thought it was a self contained home for traveling not shared.

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: Disappointed ”
content:
I wasn’t impressed with this place. 
We had the blackberry cottage. It had a damp musty smell. The fan in the bathroom unfortunately didn’t work so that may have contributed.  Steamed up the room quite bad. There was mould on the ceiling of both the bathroom above the shower and outside the door.   The windowsills were also old and dirty.
The ceilings and walls could do with a deep clean.   There was a frame hanging over the bed that was made of material which also smelt musty.  It looked very old. 
There was no hairdryer in the bathroom. 
No continental breakfast included like other establishments. Had to pay extra for this which we didn’t. 
We were disappointed in this place. It looked to be once a loved and well cared for establishment but now seems run down. 
Just needs freshening up and aired out with some finishing touches.

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: This place is living on previous owners’ reviews”
content:
Dirty road  signage looking very tired.  Terrible dead grass entrance - obviously just nuked.  Smiley hosts opened dirty door with tied rubbish bags behind them.  Divine food smell but no offers of meals available.  Plastic x bell holder still there. 
When showed room, was asked if was alone.  When said yes, extra pillows removed from bed.  Later I asked for them back and was given them.  Old fridge with torn notice about not keeping gas filled bottles (beer, fizzy drinks) under (rusting) door less freezer compartment.  Tatty bed covers.  Very comfortable bed (with returned pillows), but could hear every word said next door.  When I looked up in shower a revoltingly dirty fan thick in brown gunk.  No nice little nz made soaps etc.  Only one towel and flannel.  Huge plastic supermarket shampoo, conditioner, soap instead of offering nz little treats.  Very adorable starving cat trying desperately to get into the rooms for a feed and warmth.  The x owners’ left behind cat??

Old fridge with torn notice about not keeping gas filled bottles (beer, fizzy drinks) under (rusting) door less freezer compartment.  Tatty bed covers.  Very comfortable bed (with returned pillows), but could hear every word said next door.  When I looked up in shower a revoltingly dirty fan thick in brown gunk.  No nice little nz made soaps etc.  Only one towel and flannel.  Huge plastic supermarket shampoo, conditioner, soap instead of offering nz little treats.  Very adorable starving cat trying desperately to get into the rooms for a feed and warmth.  The x owners’ left behind cat??

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: Disappointed ”
content:
I wasn’t impressed with this place. 
We had the blackberry cottage. It had a damp musty smell. The fan in the bathroom unfortunately didn’t work so that may have contributed.  Steamed up the room quite bad. There was mould on the ceiling of both the bathroom above the shower and outside the door.   The windowsills were also old and dirty.
The ceilings and walls could do with a deep clean.   There was a frame hanging over the bed that was made of material which also smelt musty.  It looked very old. 
There was no hairdryer in the bathroom. 
No continental breakfast included like other establishments. Had to pay extra for this which we didn’t. 
We were disappointed in this place. It looked to be once a loved and well cared for establishment but now seems run down. 
Just needs freshening up and aired out with some finishing touches.

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: Very hard to find on a dark, rainy night”
content: Should have arrived earlier, as grounds looked lovely, but had to leave early the next morning.

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: Shared house”
content:
Please note: lovely lady answered on arrival however we didn't realize it was an actual house with shared facilities.
Lovely lady, very clean and tidy however if you prefer your own tv, kitchen and time to yourself this may not be an option. Good for a single person, work travel but as a couple traveling, we cancelled on arrival as we thought it was a self contained home for traveling not shared.

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: Well designed room, pleasant garden”
content: Great location, pleasant stay.  Well designed room.  Though 'cottage' is a small bedsit.  Comfortable, nevertheless, the main issue was road noise.  This is not a peaceful location, situated above the corner of a noisy road with lorries.  Thus the garden although looking good was not relaxing and for a light sleeper night time required ear plugs.

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: Fabulous suite”
content: Was happy to get good last minute deal for here. Acacia Suite was quite luxurious. Spent 2nd night in BlackBerry Cottage which was more for a family....location was fabulous in country surroundings but 2 minutes to Cambridge outskirts. Clean, would highly recommend

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: 매우 좋음”
content: Lovely, peaceful  location. Not completely private if someone is staying next door as they walk past while you’re looking at the view. Just closed curtains. Would definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: Loved my Room!”
content: I absolutely loved my room - Vicki and Karl did an incredible job with the décor of the room, and I especially loved the regency style chairs and the old-fashioned cabinet/bookcase that contained a lot of my favourite books (not sure how Vicki knew that!) I also loved the bathroom that was also very tastefully decorated - this has been my favourite accommodation by far!

hotel_name: 캠브리지 코치 하우스 럭셔리 코티지 (Cambridge Coach House Luxury Cottages)
title: Just excellent”
content:
we arrived on time, and were immediately known by our names and shown to our room.  it was spacious, a very comfortable bed, with all amenities working well, and a bathroom with all that's needed.  we dined "in", as vicki was cooking a roast for herself and husband carl, tho we had it in our room.  a few bottles of fine reds supplied meant we didn't have to looking for a bottle shop.
breakfast was just too good.  scrambled eggs better than i can cook, lean bacon, toast, baked beans, juice, coffee ... ripper.
